item.title: The Crier/Spokesmen (Social Class Idea)
item.dc:creator: SabreOverdrive
item.description:
Excuse me since I haven’t posted in a while due to hiatus…

Crier (Social BD)
Passive - Royal Servation - Can not step for king or be Occupied, can be redirected.
Night Ability 1 - Notification - Annonymously send a message to the court. 2 uses (This ability has the same rules as trollbox does)
Night Ability 2 - Listen Type - Learn what kind of ability your target uses. Based on what they do. (rules down below, can only select one target and kings once)

Types -
Heals, Empowers will come up as Support
Occupies and Redirection (Merc/Sellsword guard doesn’t count) will come up Offensive
Investigative abilities are self explanatory.
Abilities that count as killing. (Excluding Knight Guard, Circles, Poss jumps, Hunters mark (Which counts as a offensive))
Social abilities, Maid spy and Gossip (Frames and Links are Special)
Special. Converts and any abilities that don’t fit in to this

Spokesmen (Social BD)
Passive - Darker Technique - Can not step for king or be occupied. If there was no second Mastermind. Then you will become the second Mastermind when all of the unseen has died out. Can not be redirected.
Night Ability 1 - Notification - Annonymously send a message to the court. 2 uses (Same rules as trollbox)
Night Ability 2 - Listen Ability - Learn what ability your target uses. (can only select one target and kings once)
